text:
@RandPaul @Mountaingoat957 @NYGovCuomo Hey @RandPaul I’d rather be remembered for impeaching a corrupt inept president. 
But you didn’t do that.

YOU enabled Donald Trump.
His ignorant downplaying of COVID. 

Gov Cuomo had to deal with the pain and suffering of New York.

SHAME ON YOU!!

#Covid19 https://t.co/aQarNWkaXS
